link:linkbase.xsi:schemaLocation: http://www.xbrl.org/2003/linkbase http://www.xbrl.org/2003/xbrl-linkbase-2003-12-31.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/generic http://www.xbrl.org/2008/generic-link.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/boolean http://www.xbrl.org/2008/boolean-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/formula http://www.xbrl.org/2008/formula.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/assertion/consistency http://www.xbrl.org/2008/consistency-assertion.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/assertion/existence http://www.xbrl.org/2008/existence-assertion.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/assertion/value http://www.xbrl.org/2008/value-assertion.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/variable http://www.xbrl.org/2008/variable.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/period http://www.xbrl.org/2008/period-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/concept http://www.xbrl.org/2008/concept-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/tuple http://www.xbrl.org/2008/tuple-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/dimension http://www.xbrl.org/2008/dimension-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/general http://www.xbrl.org/2008/general-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/label http://www.xbrl.org/2008/generic-label.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/validation http://www.xbrl.org/2008/validation.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/unit http://www.xbrl.org/2008/unit-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2010/message http://www.xbrl.org/2010/generic-message.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/match http://www.xbrl.org/2008/match-filter.xsd

generic:link.msg:message: "Commercial Papers" = "Subscribed by Retail Investors" + "Subscribed by Mutual Funds" + "Subscribed by Banks" + "Subscribed by NBFCs" + "Subscribed by Insurance Companies" + "Subscribed by Pension Funds" "Others"
"Bank Borrowings" = "Term Loans" + "Working Capital loans" + "Cash Credit" + "Overdraft"
"Inter Corporate Deposits" = "From Group Entities" + "From Non-Group Entities"
"Secured Debentures" = "Convertible" + "Non-Convertible"
"Unsecured Debentures" = "Convertible" + "Non-Convertible"
"Net NPAs percentage" = ("Net NPAs Amount" * 100) / ("Gross Credit Exposure")

va:valueAssertion.test: if ($V3 != 0) then round(($V1),2) = round(($V2 div $V3),2) else ($V1 =0)

generic:link.msg:message: "Leverage Ratio" = ("Total Outside Liabilities") / ("Owned Funds")
"CRAR Percentage" = ("Net Owned Funds (Tier I)" * 100) / ("Total Risk Weighted Assets")
"Minimum Capital Ratio (ANW/ RWA) Percentage" = ("Adjusted Net Worth" * 100) / ("Total Risk Weighted Assets")
"Gross NPAs percentage" = ("Gross NPAs Amount" * 100) / ("Gross Credit Exposure")

va:valueAssertion.test: (if ($V1 != "(ii) NBFC-Core Investment Company (CIC)") then (not(empty($V2))) else 'false') and (if ($V1 = "(ii) NBFC-Core Investment Company (CIC)") then (empty($V2)) else 'false')

generic:link.msg:message: Reporting of the field "Net Owned Funds (Tier I)" will be blocked only if user selects "(ii) NBFC-Core Investment Company (CIC)" from "Classification of the NBFC" dropdown

va:valueAssertion.test: (if ($V1 = "(ii) NBFC-Core Investment Company (CIC)") then (not(empty($V2))) else 'false') and (if ($V1 != "(ii) NBFC-Core Investment Company (CIC)") then (empty($V2)) else 'false')

generic:link.msg:message: Reporting of the field "Adjusted Net Worth" will be blocked only if user selects "(ii) NBFC-Core Investment Company (CIC)" from "Classification of the NBFC" dropdown

va:valueAssertion.test: (if ($V1 = "(v) NBFC- Micro Finance Institution") then (not(empty($V2))) else 'false') and (if ($V1 != "(v) NBFC- Micro Finance Institution") then (empty($V2)) else 'false')

generic:link.msg:message: Reporting of the field "Qualifying Assets" will be open only if user selects "(v) NBFC- Micro Finance Institution" from "Classification of the NBFC" dropdown

va:valueAssertion.test: (if ($V1 != "(ii) NBFC-Core Investment Company (CIC)") then (not(empty($V2))) else 'false') and (if ($V1 = "(ii) NBFC-Core Investment Company (CIC)") then (empty($V2)) else 'false')

generic:link.msg:message: Reporting of the field "CRAR(%)" will be blocked only if user selects "(v) NBFC- Micro Finance Institution" from "Classification of the NBFC" dropdown

va:valueAssertion.test: (if ($V1 = "(ii) NBFC-Core Investment Company (CIC)") then (not(empty($V2))) else 'false') and (if ($V1 != "(ii) NBFC-Core Investment Company (CIC)") then (empty($V2)) else 'false')

generic:link.msg:message: Reporting of the field "Minimum Capital Ratio (ANW/ RWA)" will be open only if user selects "(ii) NBFC-Core Investment Company (CIC)" from "Classification of the NBFC" dropdown

va:valueAssertion.test: (if ($V1 != "(ii) NBFC-Core Investment Company (CIC)") then (not(empty($V2))) else 'false') and (if ($V1 = "(ii) NBFC-Core Investment Company (CIC)") then (empty($V2)) else 'false')

variable:precondition.test: $V1 != "(ix) NBFC- Securitization Company /Asset Reconstruction Company (SC/ ARC)"

generic:link.msg:message: Reporting of the field "Tier II (%)" will be blocked only if user selects "(ii) NBFC-Core Investment Company (CIC)" from "Classification of the NBFC" dropdown

va:valueAssertion.test: (if ($V1 != "(ix) NBFC- Securitization Company /Asset Reconstruction Company (SC/ ARC)") then (not(empty($V2))) else 'false') and (if ($V1 = "(ix) NBFC- Securitization Company /Asset Reconstruction Company (SC/ ARC)") then (empty($V2)) else 'false')

generic:link.msg:message: Reporting of the field "Tier II (%)" will be open only if user selects "”Asset Reconstruction Company" from "Classification of the NBFC" dropdown
"Percentage shareholding of promoters" should be greater than or equal to 0% and less than or equal to 100%
Reporting of "Remark" is not mandatory if "Net Owned Funds (Tier I)" is not reported
Reporting of "Remark" is not mandatory if "Adjusted Net Worth" is not reported
Reporting of "Remark" is not mandatory if "Net Assets" is not reported
Reporting of "Remark" is not mandatory if "Qualifying Assets" is not reported
Reporting of "Remark" is not mandatory if "CRAR (%)" is not reported
Reporting of "Remark" is not mandatory if "Tier II (%)" is not reported
Reporting of "Remark" is not mandatory if "Minimum Capital Ratio (ANW/ RWA) (%)" is not reported

va:valueAssertion.test: (if ($V1 = "(ii) NBFC-Core Investment Company (CIC)") then (not(empty($V2))) else 'false') and (if ($V1 != "(ii) NBFC-Core Investment Company (CIC)") then (empty($V2)) else 'false')

generic:link.msg:message: Value assertion not satisfied [If user selects "(ii) NBFC-Core Investment Company (CIC)" from ‘Classification of the NBFC’ dropdown then field ‘Net Assets’ will open for user entry else it will be blocked]
